indicatorName:
Reduction in gang activity 
in the area
proxyDescription:
A (fictional) study has shown that there is
a direct correlation between gang activity 
and the amount of grafitti in the area.
It also quantifies that sanation of an average piece of grafitti (at least 50x50cm) 
costs 500 €.
sourceCitation: Lindley, J., & Coulton, P. (2016, May). Pushing the limits of design fiction: The case for fictional research papers. In Proceedings of the 2016 CHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems (pp. 4032-4043).

proxyDescription: The social cost of carbon (SCC) is the marginal cost of the impacts caused by emitting one extra tonne of greenhouse gas (carbon dioxide equivalent) at any point in time, inclusive of 'non-market' impacts on the environment and human health.
sourceCitation: Chris W Hope, 2011. "The Social Cost of CO2 from the PAGE09 Model"

Proportion of agricultural area under productive and sustainable agriculture. The purpuse is to ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production.
Formula: 𝐴𝑟𝑒𝑎 𝑢𝑛𝑑𝑒𝑟 𝑝𝑟𝑜𝑑𝑢𝑐𝑡𝑖𝑣𝑒 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑠𝑢𝑠𝑡𝑎𝑖𝑛𝑎𝑏𝑙𝑒 𝑎𝑔𝑟𝑖𝑐𝑢𝑙𝑡𝑢𝑟𝑒 (numerator) / 𝐴𝑔𝑟𝑖𝑐𝑢𝑙𝑡𝑢𝑟𝑎𝑙 𝑙𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑎𝑟𝑒𝑎 (denominator)
proxyName: Fewer interventions and tillage of soil

proxyDescription: Freshwater withdrawal as a proportion of available freshwater resources with purpose to ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater snd to address water scarcity.
